title: Supreme Court allows Texas to use Trump-backed congressional map in midterms | CNN Politics
description: The Supreme Court on Thursday allowed Texas to use a congressional map that will boost President Donald Trump’s effort to keep Republicans in control of Congress, blocking a lower court decision that found the new boundaries were likely unconstitutional becau…
